channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 20:51 Air anxiety in the Nikolaev area follow further messages.
item.description: 🔴 20:51 Air anxiety in the Nikolaev area follow further messages. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟡 18:44 Auxiliary in Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Marganets and Marhanetsky Territorial Community-Mirorsk Territorial Community- Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community- Pokrovsk Territorial Community

Please note that the alarm is still in:- Marganets and Marhanetsky Territorial Community-Mirorsk Territorial Community- Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community- Pokrovsk Territorial Community#Dnepropetrovsk_.
